title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: Wow, I considered this topic interested because we should have clarity in the mist of sugar. You know sugar taste sweet but abuse of it can leads to diabetes. Cryptosystem is wide spread sugar that has good and bad effect, but how you approach it matters a lot.Bitcoin in particular has put so many smiles and tears in the faces of so many people, to some is a loss investment, to some a great investment project, to some regrettable moment, to some most serene project.From my little experience, knowledge, news and learning cryptosystem has it own advantage and disadvantages, we will be looking at them below:Advantages of Cryptocurrency;*it gives you choice* it gives you money* it gives you knowledge of trading* it gives you risks management attitude* exposure, links you to the worldDisadvantages;* it can be time consuming* the losses are irreversible* it prone to scammers* its discouraged seeking further career* it can cause shocks and death

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on February 18, 2023, 04:20:17 PMAdvantages of Cryptocurrency;*it gives you choiceChoice to take risk, be degen and have loss.Quote* it gives you moneyNone of them give you money. If you buy altcoins, you lose.Quote* it gives you knowledge of tradingKnowledge must be learned from trading books, courses, not from cryptocurrencies.Awesome crypto trading

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Any thing can be time consuming.  Any thing can be prone to scammers.  It can cause shock and death if you are not responsible and put in more than you can afford.  Losses are reversible if you have the right investment and do not exit desperately out of panic.If you think these are the disadvantages.  You are probably investing in the wrong things or read too much news about hacks and scams.  If you invest in Bitcoin, hold on to your investment and keep your Coins stored safe, there is no time to waste, no scam to be a victim of, no death, no loss and after only a few market cycles the only shock you will have is how much purchasing power you have earned.-Regards,PrivacyG

comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on February 18, 2023, 04:20:17 PM* it can be time consumingCryptocurrency is not time consuming, I don't really know why you said it's time consuming, you can be anywhere and you will still be trading, to buy a coin or to sell a coin those not really take any time, so I don't know why you think cryptocurrency is time consuming if you can explain. comments.body: I can see the advantage of cryptocurrency as less hassle and very convenient to do some transactions. Not on everything but probably makes the hard process easier.Also you could learn some ways on how to earn online, and manage your skills on doing trading. Many ways on how to benefit on cryptocurrency like savings or foing staking that gives you higher % than banks.What I dont like are the growing pain the in ass of scammers which literally abusing the wonderful effect on blockchain just to earn money.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on February 18, 2023, 04:20:17 PMDisadvantages;* it can be time consuming* the losses are irreversible* it prone to scammers* its discouraged seeking further career* it can cause shocks and deathIf you have stayed in the bank from morning till night because of a single transaction, you will know that cryptocurrencies transaction is not time consuming. To open an a bank account, you will need to fill different forms and go through many processes. It is true that cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible, that is why we need to check and recheck before we click the send button. We should be extra careful before we carryout any transaction.Banks are more prone to scams and attack than bitcoin. All we need to do is to used decentralized wallets and never keep your funds in exchanges because they are prone to attack of hackers and government.I don't see how the cryptocurrency sector discourages people to seek opportunities in other areas. Most people in this sector use the cryptocurrency sector as a side hustle or part-time job. Apart from Bitcointalk I am not engaged in any other platform. If I can invest in the sector, hold my coins and sell them when the price goes high, then I am okay. I don't need to spend all my time in the sector. And it is also good to diversify your income source.Please always invest what you can afford to loose. Don't borrow to invest in Bitcoin and don't put all your funds in Bitcoin because the sector is also unpredictable. Investors must also understand that losing funds is not the end of the world. As long as there is life, there is hope and more opportunities will also come..

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on February 18, 2023, 04:20:17 PMDisadvantages;* it can be time consuming* its discouraged seeking further career If by time consuming you mean the transaction period it takes to complete the transactions then I would tell tell you that there are method to fasten the transaction. There is a replace by fee method which is supported by some wallets or the double spending method. In each method you just need to increase the network fee higher for faster confirmation. This gives you the ability to control your transaction time and not the local fiat banks where you need to wait for the banks. Cryptocurrency actually encourages diversification because people from other professions could easily venture into cryptocurrency and blockchain technology, and still keep practicing their other profession. Those who stick only to cryptocurrency trading only are even prone to make bad/panic investments since they relay on its profits only.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Well, every one is entitled to their own opinions about cryptocurrency and while the op mentioned some advantages, I'd like to also note that these cryptos have granted a sort of freedom from central banks as one can conduct transactions without it being monitored and transaction fees are low they can be ignored. Also, crypto transactions can be done night or day and no limit to withdrawals or purchases.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on February 18, 2023, 04:20:17 PMFrom my little experience, knowledge, news and learning cryptosystem has it own advantage and disadvantages, we will be looking at them below:Advantages of Cryptocurrency;*it gives you choice* it gives you money* it gives you knowledge of trading* it gives you risks management attitude* exposure, links you to the worldDisadvantages;* it can be time consuming* the losses are irreversible* it prone to scammers* its discouraged seeking further career* it can cause shocks and deathThankfully your experience isn't advance yet because it would had been shocking that with your advance experience and you're coming up with this poorly structured points of yours. Yes cryptocurency gives you choice since it offers a different kind of investment opportunity different from the traditional investment vehicles we know but cryptocurrency doesn't automatically gives you money. You have to know how to take advantage of the opportunity here and have the capital before you'll be able to make money from the industry. No the industry doesn't give you knowledge on trading although it could motivate you to learn since trading has been made very easy with the introduction of the cryptocurrency industry. Basically most of your advantages are what been engaged in the industry can motivate you to do.As for the disadvantage, the industry is even less time consuming compared to other financial markets and I doubt how your involvement in the industry will hinder your educational career instead it could motivate you into picking interest in other careers related to the industry. Everything can cause shock or death so I don't see that as a disadvantage to the industry. Using general disadvantages of life that has nothing to do with the industry directly doesn't qualify to be a disadvantage to the industry.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: Crypto doesn't give knowledge, it's not a knowledge ORB sent down from heaven, everything about Crypto must be acquired through learning only, this is the only way to know how to manage risk and make money out of your investments. * Is there any money making ways that's not time-consuming? Every human in the world will be rich if it's easy to make money.* Once you lose your key or fall victim to scam traps your fund is gone forever, but you can still make back all you've lost, I fell for scam years ago and I lost all my ETH but as time goes on I earned more than I've lost. * You are right about how easy it is to lose your private key to scammers, but it still all comes down to your knowledge, learning is the most important part of cryptocurrencies, you need to know how to keep your private keys safe or just buy a hardware wallet instead. * Crypto doesn't stop anyone from furthering their career, this is a wrongful thought, I have my own business, and I'm into crypto investment too, I do trading twice a week and I take my business very seriously. * Crypto investment can only cause shock and death if you invest all your life savings, investing money in crypto is very risky because of the volatility aspect, a smart investor only invest with what they are ready to lose, if you lose five percent of all the money you have in this life to crypto it won't kill you, because you still have 95% left.
